content: This one is pretty trivial, if someone could say d+ I will merge.

Sorry, I messed up that PR: I thought I'd made it from a passing nightly-testing, but there were some timeouts and an added erw that I've just put in.

@Ruben Van de Velde or @Markus Himmel, would you be able to take a look again and see if you're happy to proceed with these?
lgtm once you fix the shake and the lint errors
